question: [Note] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.

qas.question: [Note] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.
[Rapid] English: Tell which category has the lowest bar from the bar chart.
[Study] Dansk: Angiv what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars fra sojlediagrammet.
